Articles.Content:
Sorry for minimal explaintation and for my bad English!

It would be nice if you could add a telescope into the game.

Why? Because there are players who would like to see other planets.

I know that we can see them from the Space Center, but it would be much better and nicer to have such a telescope.

I said what I wanted, now it's for you to decide.

Suggested already, time and time again. It doesn't hurt to do a quick forum search.

You may be interested in some of the telescope mods that are available. Compatibility 0.21.1 is a bit spotty at the moment, though.

Not only has it been suggested before, it's a planned feature

There's going to be an observatory that you need to use in career mode to discover planets and probably solar systems whenever they get around to adding that top-end stuff. They'll probably also have things like orbital telescopes and things like that...either for science or just to help fill out your knowledgebase.
